rules.description: Caps Lock → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧⌘) (Caps Lock if alone)
Caps Lock → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧⌘) (Caps Lock if alone)

manipulators.description: Super (Tab) + m → toggle yabai float manage
Super (Tab) + f → toggle yabai window fullscreen
Super (Tab) + w → yabai window move to up
Super (Tab) + a → yabai window move to left
Super (Tab) + s → yabai window move down
Super (Tab) + l → yabai window move to right
Super (Tab) + q → yabai window move to prev space
Super (Tab) + e → yabai window move to next space
Super (Tab) + h → yabai window focus left
Super (Tab) + j → yabai window focus down
Super (Tab) + k → yabai window focus up
Super (Tab) + l → yabai window focus right
Super (Tab) + g → yabai window focus recent
